articles.title: Tamim, Taskin combine to roll SA, claim historic series win as hosts ponder World Cup issues
articles.description: South Africa's automatic path to the 2023 Cricket World Cup hasn't just hit an obstacle, but has firmly run aground after their nine-wicket loss to Bangladesh in the third ODI at SuperSport Park on Wednesday.
articles.content:
• South Africa's World Cup qualification path is in tatters after their embarrassing nine-wicket loss to Bangladesh at SuperSport Park on Wednesday.
